content: I didnt see any definition for the HTTP status code to be used to indicate partial success of the batch interaction. I understand the response has to be a Bundle with either the resource(except for Prefer: minimal) or OperationOutcome but is there a recommendation/best practice for the HTTP status code to be used to indicate partial success? Also, is there a differentiation needed when all interactions within the batch bundle fail?
200 OK if processing the batch itself succeeds, irrespective of the operations in the batch. 4xx or 5xx if the processing didn't get to the batch stage
